title: Got leave buster because of the loging issue
body:
So basically i wanted to play a ranked match,  then while i was in the loading screen i got an internet issue and when i tried to log in so i can play the match it said that i may be offline and i couldnt log in in time and i got leave buster 20 minutes for the next 5 games and lost my lp
Thats so nice isnt it{{champion:3}}

replies.body: yeah same thing just happened to me. game crashes and riot apparently doesn't have people that are looking for these posts to disable the leaver buster

We've got a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page on this issue now.  To sum it up, it looks like there's an issue when trying to log back into the client while in a game.  

If you happen to crash out or run into this issue for some reason, [there is a workaround](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) you can use:

* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
* Find the line:

   gameflow-patcher-lock:


* Delete this whole line
* Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

Getting a Leaverbuster for that sucks!  I can't make any guarantees, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as we like to look at each case individually.  See you there!
Same thing m8.. It's really fucking stupid that Riot does not reverse these issues and do loss prevented for those of us who legit had issues...
